config.script:
# Toggle visibility of the display options.
	
	self.getSibling("Options").position.display = not self.getSibling("Options").position.display

# Set the Color Scheme to be traditional/rainbow.
	
	self.session.custom.ColorScheme = 0

# Set the Color Scheme to be [default]BMS/Blue/red.
	
	self.session.custom.ColorScheme = 1

# Change the base on mode to desiredSP.
	
	self.session.custom.FloorColorFromDesiredSP=True

# Change the base on mode to realTemp.
	
	self.session.custom.FloorColorFromDesiredSP=False

transforms.code:
# When searching for zones, the zones that match the search have
	# instanceStyle.display set to 'flex', and the rest of the zones
	# have instanceStyle.display set to 'none'. This script looks at
	# the zone instances, figures out which instances are being
	# displayed (for floor 1), appends the name of each zone being
	# displayed to a list, and then returns the list. In the floorplan, 
	# the labels that correspond to the elements in the labelDisplay
	# list will be displayed (for example, if Label 1-4 is in the 
	# labelDisplay list, because Zone 1-4 is being displayed, then the 
	# '1-4' label will be visible on the floorplan).
	
	labelDisplay = []
	
	for instance in value:
		vav = instance.vav.split(' ')[1]
		if vav[0] == '1':
			if instance.instanceStyle.display == 'flex':
				if vav[2] == '0':
					vav = vav.replace('0','')
				labelName = 'Label ' + vav
				labelDisplay.append(labelName)
	
	return labelDisplay

# When searching for zones, the zones that match the search have
	# instanceStyle.display set to 'flex', and the rest of the zones
	# have instanceStyle.display set to 'none'. This script looks at
	# the zone instances, figures out which instances are being
	# displayed (for floor 2), appends the name of each zone being
	# displayed to a list, and then returns the list. In the floorplan, 
	# the labels that correspond to the elements in the labelDisplay
	# list will be displayed (for example, if Label 2-2 is in the 
	# labelDisplay list, because Zone 2-2 is being displayed, then the 
	# '2-2' label will be visible on the floorplan).
	
	labelDisplay = []
	
	for instance in value:
		vav = instance.vav.split(' ')[1]
		if vav[0] == '2':
			if instance.instanceStyle.display == 'flex':
				if vav[2] == '0':
					vav = vav.replace('0','')
				labelName = 'Label ' + vav
				labelDisplay.append(labelName)
	
	return labelDisplay

config.script:
# Toggle the visibility of the sorting options.
	
	self.getSibling("Options").position.display = not self.getSibling("Options").position.display

# Send a message to sortZones handler to change the sort order to ascending.
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('sortZones',payload={'dir':'ascending'},scope='page')
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-100)'
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-70)'

# Send a message to sortZones handler to change the sort order to descending.
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('sortZones',payload={'dir':'descending'},scope='page')
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-100)'
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-70)'

# Send a message to sortZones handler to change the sort type.
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('sortZones',payload={'type':self.props.value},scope='page')

transforms.code:
# This applies the sorting and searching on the zones list. Looking at the
	# 'exp' property in the expression structure binding, if the sort type is
	# looking at the area/dept of the zone or the name of the zone, then we
	# only need to execute the sort once (area/dept and zone name are static).
	# If the sort type is not area/dept or zone name, then utilize the now()
	# function to re-apply the sorting every 10 seconds.
	
	search = value['search']
	
	if len(search) == 0:
		# No search, so make sure that all instances are being displayed.
		
		for instance in self.props.instances:
			if instance['instanceStyle']['display'] == 'none':
				instance['instanceStyle']['display'] = 'flex'
	else:
		# User is searching for something. Make search text lowercase,
		# iterate through zones to see which zones contain the search
		# text within their "area + vavName + requesting", and set the
		# instanceStyle.display for each zone accordingly.
		
		search = search.lower()
		
		for instance in self.props.instances:
			whatToSearch = instance['area'] + instance['vav'] + instance['req']
			
			if search not in whatToSearch.lower():
				instance['instanceStyle']['display'] = 'none'
			else:
				instance['instanceStyle']['display'] = 'flex'
	
	# Apply the sorting using 'sorted' function.
				
	sortType = value['sortType']
	sortDir = value['sortDir']
	
	if sortDir == 'ascending':
		self.props.instances = sorted(self.props.instances, key=lambda d: d[sortType])
	else:
		self.props.instances = sorted(self.props.instances, key=lambda d: d[sortType], reverse=True)

config.script:
# Display the legend.
	
	self.getSibling("Key").position.display = not self.getSibling("Key").position.display
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-100)'
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-70)'

# Display the legend.
	
	self.getSibling("SP Popup").position.display = not self.getSibling("SP Popup").position.display
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-100)'
self.props.fill = 'var(--neutral-70)'
